name: require-dir-all
description: Yet another Node.js helper to require all files in directory

scripts._deps-update: echo '* Updating packages versions... '; npm-check-updates -u --upgradeAll --error-level 1 && npm run _deps-update
scripts._check-changes: echo '* Checking if git directory is clean... '; bash -c '[[ -z $(git status -uno --porcelain) ]]'
scripts.update-deps: npm run _check-changes && npm install && git commit -am 'updated deps'
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run inspect && npm run nsp && npm run _deps-check
scripts.commit-and-push: npm run _commit && npm test && npm run _push
scripts.patch-release: npm test && npm run _patch-release && npm run _push
scripts.minor-release: npm test && npm run _minor-release && npm run _push
scripts.__major-release: npm test && npm run _major-release && npm run _push
